msg: All comments in template to properly echo out to the rendered page.

author: kelvingoodson
msg: TUSCANY-1021 this is a partial fix, and puts in place the infrastructure for checking equality and making copies of change summaries for shallow and deep operations,  but the deep copies/comparisons are at least initially going to be implemented using serialization/deserialization of the change summary. For now the deep operations throw UnsupportedOperationExceptions.
